text: This repository contains a few shortcuts that | use with Obsidian 7. The defaults hotkeys are: Hotkey Action Author ctrl + M Toggle between checkmarks. ctrl + shift + M Toggle between ordered and unordered lists. ctrl + < Toggle blockquotes. ctrl + shift + 1 Toggle embeds for internal links. lynchjames tf Blank by default Copy line(s) down NomarCub & Blank by default Copy line(s) up tzarick &4 Blank by default Insert line below/above current line Vinzent & Blank by default clear current line renmui23
